name: Swingggggg
description:
Unique swinging mechanic - easy to learn but really hard to master! 

Various enemies and hazards - don’t get hit and smash them away!

Juicy audiovisual feedback - it feels so good!

SPACEBAR for sticking/unsticking the pivot

← → KEYS for rotating gravity

Developers: Masato Lin, Michael Ford, Haocheng Liu, Sanketh Bhat

Music: https://youtu.be/5XWQM08Ed9o

Proudly made in USC Games CSCI426 Game Prototyping taught by Andy Nealen
